Meaning: ITS file name. (Future versions will separate ITS file name and ITS child ID.)
Internal: Recordings level of .its file imported and converted into data.table.
CSV of Recordings level of .its file written to `CSV.dir`.
Internal: Conversation & Pause Blocks level of .its file imported and converted into data.table.
CSV of Conversation & Pause Blocks level of .its file written to `CSV.dir`.
Internal: Segments level of .its file imported and converted into data.table.
CSV of Segments level of .its file written to `CSV.dir`.
Internal: Segments data expanded to 1 row per centisecond of the day, starting from midnight the day the recorder was first turned on.
CSV of centiseconds data.table written to `CSV.dir`.
Internal: Centiseconds collapsed into seconds of day by calculating over 100 rows at a time, starting from midnight the day the recorder was first turned on.
CSV of seconds data.table written to `CSV.dir`.
